Table FM1_計量單位-集團級

Card of table FM1_計量單位-集團級

Name

FM1_計量單位-集團級

Code

fm1_unit

DBMS

Microsoft SQL Server 2017 (iuap)


Check constraint name of the table FM1_計量單位-集團級

CKT_FM1_UNIT


Server validation rule of the table FM1_計量單位-集團級

%RULES%


Code preview of the table FM1_計量單位-集團級

if exists (select 1
from sysobjects
where id = object_id('fm1_unit')
and type = 'U')
drop table fm1_unit
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: fm1_unit */
/*==============================================================*/
create table fm1_unit (
create_time varchar(64) null,
create_user varchar(64) null,
last_modified varchar(64) null,
last_modify_user varchar(64) null,
bpm_state decimal(11) null,
ts varchar(64) null,
dr decimal(11) null,
tenant_id varchar(64) null,

id type_pk not null,
code type_cd null,
name type_name null,
is_fundamental_unit type_boolean null,
fundamental_unit_pk type_pk null,
exchange_rate type_decimal null,
decimal type_number null,
name_en type_name null,
name_en_plural type_name null,
is_enabled type_boolean null,
constraint PK_FM1_UNIT primary key (id)
)
go
